title: Does anybody have a photo of Gerrit Noordzij that I can use in my talk?
content:
Does anybody have a photo of Gerrit Noordzij that I can use in my talk?

The best I have so far is this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/GN_6097.gif)

 [‹ Gill Sans Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005202/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44358 "Go to previous forum topic") [arabic / latin / hebrew question ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005202/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44526 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content: [Here’s one from a Google search.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005202/http:/www.vanoorschot.nl/?auteurnummer=95140) Don’t know if that’s high resolution enough for you, though.
Oh, when I posted, I didn’t see any visual in your post. At any rate, no help.

I did find this. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/letterror/sets/72157600531950955/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005202/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/letterror/sets/72157600531950955/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/letterror/sets/72157600531950955/")

Maybe Erik will let me use an image.

Which one? This one:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011005202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Erik'sGN2_6569.cropped.jpg)

Although it’s almost certainly obvious; T Bone’s image not of GN; it is of course a Hollywood movie monster - Frankenstein.

I actually liked the B&W one too.

BTW: If anybody has a better image I am still open to a new one. An Image of Akira Kobayashi would be fine to have too.

Cheers!
